en.title: Aircraft Performance Engineer
en.description: Created a Source Document Revision system using SharePoint to track all aircraft documentation (AFMs, Supplements, WBMs, FPMs) and their revisions. Developed and maintained performance models for various aircraft, ensuring accuracy and reliability. Conducted rigorous testing and debugging to ensure precise calculation results aligned with expected outcomes. Determined optimal takeoff and landing weights, runway length, and fuel requirements by considering meteorological conditions and aircraft-specific performance data. Utilized AFM data to calculate aircraft center of gravity and fuel burn profiles.
